lines.text: Well, um... he didn't have Go Wizard tattoos, so...
That could've prevented him from being able to move, because...
Um, because they look kind of like fire, so...
Oh! Maybe they- he did have Go Wizard tattoos, right? But when they caught on fire...
And then the magic of the tattoos being destroyed exploded out, and trapped him in the fire!
You want to come up with an idea that you actually think might be true, kid?
